participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and introspective, Emily enjoys capturing moments through photography. She is supportive but sometimes struggles with her emotions.
participant_1.background: i am fluent in english spanish and french. i am an elementary school teacher. my boyfriend and i are moving into an apartment together next week. i'm interested in photography and like taking pictures.

participant_2.name: Ryan
participant_2.personality: Optimistic and creative, Ryan enjoys teaching and expressing himself through photography. He is currently facing challenges in his personal life but maintains a positive outlook.
participant_2.background: i've a pet fish. i just broke up with boyfriend two months ago. i turned 18 years old yesterday. my favorite color is orange.
